name: Nodechat
tagline: A Node.js chat app.  Handles persistent user profiles via MongoDB.  Uses Express.js for the application framework, with MongoDB as the database system.  Uses Drywall for user auth system, allows authentication via third-party websites.
body:
### NodeChat

A Node.js chat app.  Handles persistent user profiles via MongoDB.  Uses Express.js for the application framework, with MongoDB as the database system.  Uses Drywall for user auth system, allows authentication via third-party websites.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
